upload-documents-details-document-type-b: Utility bill (electricity, gas, water, internet or telephone)
upload-documents-details-document-type-a: Document granting you authority to act on the company’s behalf
upload-documents-details-acceptance-crit: The document must be complete (with all pages).
The document must be up to date.
Your first and last names must match your customer account information.
Your first and last name, and address must match the information in your customer account.
Proof dated within the last three months.
The address on the document must match the address on the Goods and Services Tax (GST) certificate.
The address on the document must match the one in the customer account.
Company name and VAT information must be provided.
Your name, legal representative’s name, or chief operations officer’s name must be listed.
The surname, first name, date, and signature of the legal representative, operations manager, or other contact specified in the Goods and Services Tax (GST) certificate.
Accepted formats for all documents: pdf, .png, .jpg, .jpeg
File size limit for each uploaded document: 10 MB
